Name: Plant Disease Triangle
Description: Compound value holding a plant disease, its cause, and necessary environmental conditions for that disease.

Properties.Name: Host
Properties.Description: The plant that is affected by this particular disease.

Properties.Name: Plant Disease Cause
Properties.Description: Cause for a disease, such as a virus, bacteria, etc.

Properties.Name: Plant Disease Conditions
Properties.Description: Environmental conditions necessary for disease to occur

Properties.Name: Source(s)
Properties.Description: Written works that document this disease relationship.
